mapper.select: select * from post where 1 = 1 and post.content like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') and post.user_idx in (select user.idx from user where public_type = 'Y') order by (select count(*) from `like` where post_idx = post.idx) desc

select * from tag where 1 = 1 and tag.content like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') order by case when tag.content = #{keyword} then 0 when tag.content = #{keyword}+'%' then 1 when tag.content = '%'+#{keyword}+'%' then 2 when tag.content = '%'+#{keyword} then 3 else 4 end
